text: Hi all. I've got a HubDB table that I'm populating with new rows via Zapier when a certain type of object is created in Salesforce. Is it possible to use Zapier to update cells in existing rows when that object is updated in Salesforce? (I'm followed guidance in <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Zapier-Webhooks-Hubdb-Integration/td-p/224347|this post> to get started)
